scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && echo '🚀 Production build ready'

scripts.validate-env: echo '🔍 Validating environment...' && node -e "console.log('Node version:', process.version); console.log('Environment:', process.env.NODE_ENV || 'development');"

scripts.clean: echo '🧹 Cleaning build artifacts...' && echo '✅ Clean completed'
